tags: I cannot get over this poor crew
summary: With Fjord asking Twiggy to share her story I’d like to take a moment to consider all of the other stories and rumors currently...
body:
With Fjord asking Twiggy to share her story I’d like to take a moment to consider all of the other stories and rumors currently being circulated by people who have traveled/interacted with the M9:

  • They saved a small town from impending doom by gnolls!
  • They protected a small bird girl and found her a happy new family!
  • They met a bunch of bandits, pretended they had syphilis, killed their leader, gave them a stern talking to, stole their clothes, and sent them on their merry way (?)
  • They paid off this family’s debts and allowed them to return to care for their young children!
  • They met the bandits again, gave them an even sterner talking to, and send them back on their way (??)
  • They rescued so many people from magical slavers!
  • They defeated a dragon with friendship!
  • They told us they were hiring us for a quick trip and then we somehow became pirates and almost died so many times and one of them just kept making really good food and another one kept trying to give us tattoos and there was this cat that was sometimes an octopus and we’re still not sure what that was but we discussed it and we decided just to keep our heads down and not ask because they paid us in jewels that fell out of ball they said was a dragon’s lair and honestly we think they were like trickster gods sent to test us or something we don’t-

reblog.comment:
With Fjord asking Twiggy to share her story I’d like to take a moment to consider all of the other stories and rumors currently being circulated by people who have traveled/interacted with the M9:

  • They saved a small town from impending doom by gnolls!
  • They protected a small bird girl and found her a happy new family!
  • They met a bunch of bandits, pretended they had syphilis, killed their leader, gave them a stern talking to, stole their clothes, and sent them on their merry way (?)
  • They paid off this family’s debts and allowed them to return to care for their young children!
  • They met the bandits again, gave them an even sterner talking to, and send them back on their way (??)
  • They rescued so many people from magical slavers!
  • They defeated a dragon with friendship!
  • They told us they were hiring us for a quick trip and then we somehow became pirates and almost died so many times and one of them just kept making really good food and another one kept trying to give us tattoos and there was this cat that was sometimes an octopus and we’re still not sure what that was but we discussed it and we decided just to keep our heads down and not ask because they paid us in jewels that fell out of ball they said was a dragon’s lair and honestly we think they were like trickster gods sent to test us or something we don’t-

  • They protected a small bird girl and found her a happy new family!
  • They met a bunch of bandits, pretended they had syphilis, killed their leader, gave them a stern talking to, stole their clothes, and sent them on their merry way (?)
  • They paid off this family’s debts and allowed them to return to care for their young children!
  • They met the bandits again, gave them an even sterner talking to, and send them back on their way (??)
  • They rescued so many people from magical slavers!
  • They defeated a dragon with friendship!
  • They told us they were hiring us for a quick trip and then we somehow became pirates and almost died so many times and one of them just kept making really good food and another one kept trying to give us tattoos and there was this cat that was sometimes an octopus and we’re still not sure what that was but we discussed it and we decided just to keep our heads down and not ask because they paid us in jewels that fell out of ball they said was a dragon’s lair and honestly we think they were like trickster gods sent to test us or something we don’t-
trail.content:
With Fjord asking Twiggy to share her story I’d like to take a moment to consider all of the other stories and rumors currently being circulated by people who have traveled/interacted with the M9:

  • They saved a small town from impending doom by gnolls!
  • They protected a small bird girl and found her a happy new family!
  • They met a bunch of bandits, pretended they had syphilis, killed their leader, gave them a stern talking to, stole their clothes, and sent them on their merry way (?)
  • They paid off this family’s debts and allowed them to return to care for their young children!
  • They met the bandits again, gave them an even sterner talking to, and send them back on their way (??)
  • They rescued so many people from magical slavers!
  • They defeated a dragon with friendship!
  • They told us they were hiring us for a quick trip and then we somehow became pirates and almost died so many times and one of them just kept making really good food and another one kept trying to give us tattoos and there was this cat that was sometimes an octopus and we’re still not sure what that was but we discussed it and we decided just to keep our heads down and not ask because they paid us in jewels that fell out of ball they said was a dragon’s lair and honestly we think they were like trickster gods sent to test us or something we don’t-

blog.description:
these nerdy-ass voice actors have taken over my life.
(spoilers untagged, aside from liveblog posts)

tags: now if going through the orb also regened health then uh
that woulda been a bit more worrisome
summary: Not trying to give you a nightmare or anything, but if Twiggy hadn’t killed the dragon before using the orb... couldn’t it have...
question: Not trying to give you a nightmare or anything, but if Twiggy hadn’t killed the dragon before using the orb... couldn’t it have just followed them? It’s not like they could have turned the orb off after leaving...
answer: that would’ve been a whole load of Yikes™ but I think they would’ve killed it pretty quickly since it’s health was low + they would have teleported back onto the ship with their crew next to a port city - of course, if that had happened then they would’ve had to answer a Lot of questions/immediately arrested for leading a dragon to them lmao

reblog.comment: that would’ve been a whole load of Yikes™ but I think they would’ve killed it pretty quickly since it’s health was low + they would have teleported back onto the ship with their crew next to a port city - of course, if that had happened then they would’ve had to answer a Lot of questions/immediately arrested for leading a dragon to them lmao

tags: i'm bailing out fandom bullshit with a coffee strainer at this point
but this is the hill i die on
summary: It’s worth noting that Meld into Stone specifically states that the user can’t see what’s going on outside while they’re stone...
body:
It’s worth noting that Meld into Stone specifically states that the user can’t see what’s going on outside while they’re stone (and hearing is at Disadvantage) and when Caduceus popped out both Fjord and Jester were Blinked out. 

He really could only see Caleb and Nott, and would have had NO WAY of knowing that he’d left the others until he got to the other side of the portal and realized they weren’t there

reblog.comment:
